ComicInfo.Summary: Big Payback; (Sanctuary Book Five: The Wolf - Chapter Six): Lusiphur and Jace fight, Jace under the handicap of trying not to kill Lusiphur. Eventually, Vido's men storm the place and capture Lusiphur.
